 6#ifndef vsip_csl_pi_iterator_hpp_
 7#define vsip_csl_pi_iterator_hpp_

 9#include <vsip/support.hpp>
10#include <vsip/core/c++0x.hpp>
11#include <vsip/core/expr/operations.hpp>
12#include <cassert>
13
14namespace vsip_csl
15{
16namespace pi
17{
18using vsip::impl::integral_constant;
19
20typedef integral_constant<int, 0> zero_type;
21typedef integral_constant<int, 1> one_type;
22typedef integral_constant<int, 2> two_type;
23typedef integral_constant<int, 3> three_type;
24typedef integral_constant<int, 4> four_type;
25typedef integral_constant<int, 5> five_type;
26
27zero_type const _0 = zero_type();
28one_type const _1 = one_type();
29two_type const _2 = two_type();
30three_type const _3 = three_type();
31four_type const _4 = four_type();
32five_type const _5 = five_type();
33
34template <int I = 0> struct Iterator {};
35
36/// An Offset is a less efficient alternative to an iterator, 
37/// encoding the relative position with a runtime parameter.
38struct Offset
39{
40  Offset(stride_type ii) : i(ii) {}
41  stride_type i;
42};
43
44template <typename T>
45struct is_iterator { static bool const value = false;};
46
47template <int I>
48struct is_iterator<Iterator<I> > { static bool const value = true;};
49
50template <>
51struct is_iterator<Offset> { static bool const value = true;};
52
53template <int I>
54Iterator<I> operator+(Iterator<>, integral_constant<int, I>) 
55{ return Iterator<I>();}
56
57template <int I>
58Iterator<-I> operator-(Iterator<>, integral_constant<int, I>) 
59{ return Iterator<-I>();}
60
61template <int I>
62Offset operator+(Iterator<I>, stride_type o) 
63{ return Offset(I + o);}
64
65template <int I>
66Offset operator-(Iterator<I>, stride_type o) 
67{ return Offset(I - o);}
68
69/// Call forward declaration.
70template <typename Block,
71	  typename I = void,
72	  typename J = void,
73	  typename K = void> 
74struct Call;
75
76template <typename T> struct is_expr { static bool const value = false;};
77
78} // namespace vsip_csl::pi
79} // namespace vsip_csl
